menu_items.name: Couvert Artistico
menu_items.description: We inform that, according to current legislation (State Law No. 13.856/2009 of Pernambuco), our restaurant applies the artistic cover charge. This fee is intended to remunerate the musicians and artists who provide live entertainment during your visit. The value of the artistic cover charge will be added to your bill and is mandatory for all customers present during the performances. We appreciate your understanding and hope you enjoy our musical program. Sincerely, Moendo na Laje.
menu_items.ingredients: We inform that, according to current legislation (State Law No. 13.856/2009 of Pernambuco), our restaurant applies the artistic cover charge. This fee is intended to remunerate the musicians and artists who provide live entertainment during your visit. The value of the artistic cover charge will be added to your bill and is mandatory for all customers present during the performances. We appreciate your understanding and hope you enjoy our musical program. Sincerely, Moendo na Laje.
